WELLCOME_MESSAGE: Welcome to the Image Analyzer bot! I'm here to assist you. Please upload an image.
INVALID_MESSAGE_ERROR: Sorry, I can't handle this type of messages at this moment. Please upload an image.
INVALID_FILE_TYPE_ERROR: Invalid file type. Please ensure that you upload an image with either a .jpeg, .jpg, or .png file extension.
IMAGE_PROCESSING_ERROR: An error occurred while processing the image.
NO_IMAGE_UPLOADED_ERROR: Please upload an image first to get more details about it.
